disablePulse.label: Disable ping pulse
disablePulse.description: By default, ping indicators in Homarr will pulse. This may be irritating. This slider will deactivate the animation

replaceIconsWithDots.label: Replace ping dots with icons
replaceIconsWithDots.description: For colorblind users, ping dots may be unrecognizable. This will replace indicators with icons

newTab.label: Open search results in a new tab

autoFocus.label: Focus search bar on page load.
autoFocus.description: This will automatically focus the search bar, when you navigate to the board pages. It will only work on desktop devices.

template.label: Query URL
template.description: Use %s as a placeholder for the query
